* [](/2026Gala)
  * [](/Boston)
  * [](/donate)

  * ## [2026 MoAF Gala](/2026Gala)

Join us on March 5 for our 2026 Gala honoring David Booth, Mary Ellen Stanek and Byron Trott.

  * ## [MoAF Announces New Exhibit Headquarters](/Boston)

Exhibits at Commonwealth Pier in the Boston Seaport to open in July 2026.

  * ## [2025 Appeal](/donate)

Donate today. Your support helps us expand our impact, reach and footprint.

## Public Programs

[](https://www.moaf.org/events/general/2026-03-05-2026-moaf-gala-honoring-david-g-booth-mary-ellen-stanek-and-byron-d-trott)

[2026 MoAF Gala Honoring David G. Booth, Mary Ellen Stanek and Byron D. Trott](/events/general/2026-03-05-2026-moaf-gala-honoring-david-g-booth-mary-ellen-stanek-and-byron-d-trott)

Thursday, March 5, 2026  
06:00 PM to 09:00 PM 

[View All Events](/events/index)

## Publications & Collections

From our internationally recognized magazine, [_Financial History_](http://www.fhmagazine.org), to our impressive collection of documents and artifacts, the Museum is a unique national resource dedicated to the history of finance.

[Learn More](/publications-collections/index)

## News

  * December 02, 2025  
[The Museum of American Finance is Coming to Boston](/news/media_mentions/2025-12-02-the-museum-of-american-finance-is-coming-to-boston)
  * October 15, 2025  
[Museum of American Finance to Present In-Person Panel on “Unlocking Private Market Investments for Retail Investors: Pros and Cons”](/news/press_releases/2025-10-1...
